description:
Do you want to help out Fang Yao and He Youzai in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers? Although not too obvious at first glance, the fates of these characters are intertwined. Soon, you'll realize that this whole chain of events actually leads to a massive arc that spans the entire campaign. Our guide has you covered, but be forewarned that there are major spoilers ahead.

How to complete the He Youzai and Fang Yao quests in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

He Youzai's and Fang Yao's quests, at the start, tend to happen independently of each other. Much later, though, you'll learn of a certain connection between the two. It's imperative that you tackle each step in the correct order. Otherwise, you might encounter issues and the arc
title: How To Complete The He Youzai And Fang Yao Quest In Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

description:
Are you hoping to finish the Nian Suichang quest in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers? You encounter this NPC several times throughout your journey and, more often than not, he brags about showcasing his might. Of course, helping him yields a bunch of rewards, including unique weapons and armors. Before we continue, though, please be reminded that this article contains spoilers.

How to complete the Nian Suichang quest in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

The Nian Suichang quest begins at Narrow Stretch, just an hour or so after starting the campaign. This whole arc will take you all the way to the late-game stages. Be sure to give him the items that he needs, as well as meet him in the required locations. Otherwise, he might not show up
title: How To Complete The Nian Suichang Quest In Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

description:
Are you excited to help the Great Yonder Gang in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers? This group of kids can be found in the Cloudspire region. Naturally, you'll be able to help them to receive a bunch of goodies. However, certain mistakes could also spell their doom. In any case, our guide has all the information that you need, but there will also be a few spoilers later on.

How to complete the Great Yonder Gang quest in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

The Great Yonder Gang consists of their leader Shen Jing'an, and members Matchstick and Glut. Jing'an's dad, Butler Shen, also takes care of the kids.

Note that these quest steps initially take place in the Cloudspire region. As such, you must avoid going to Mt. Zhenwu too early in t
title: How To Complete The Great Yonder Gang Quest In Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

description:
Are you planning to complete the Huang Jian'e quest in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers? This Taoist adherent seems to be addled at first glance. Then, she remembers past events that transpired, causing her to swear vengeance to those who've ransacked her temple. We've got all the details for you here, but be forewarned that there are spoilers ahead.

How to complete the Huang Jian'e quest in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

The Huang Jian'e quest begins at Shu Sanctum. You need to acquire specific items for her, as well as meet her in certain locations. Only then will you be able to summon her for a particular boss fight. Note that a single mistake may cause the entire quest chain to end prematurely.


Huang Jian'e
title: How To Complete The Huang Jian'e Quest In Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
